name: 李老师不是你老师
content: One author said that articles on public accounts related to movies are constantly being processed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the 35th anniversary of June 4th approaches, we collaborate with China Human Rights @hrichina and Humanitarian China @HChina89 to release a series of June 4th special photos from the scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement (May 18)
[Heroic pride displayed in heavy rain] [Li Peng’s dialogue was incomprehensible] [Armed troops from other places came to Beijing to support]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 19, in Wuhan, Hubei, the management of Binjiang Market received a silk banner from vendors with the words "Market tyrants, vegetable tyrants, bullies, and market tyrants" printed on it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 18, Harbin, Heilongjiang. Some citizens complained that in order to welcome Putin's visit, the local government implemented strict security measures, some people were forced to temporarily move to hotels, and some windows and lights had to be closed. 
Afterwards, Putin apologized for the inconvenience caused to Harbin citizens by his visit.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is reported that in order to welcome Putin's visit, Harbin has started a "city-wide cleaning mode"
One netizen lamented that "I have lived here for decades before I realized that the corridor downstairs is paved with red bricks"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 19, Ma Jiantang, former Party Secretary of the National Research Center, said at the first Shenzhen Financial Forum of Renmin University of China that people aged 60-70 are young elderly people, they are in good health and have the need to find jobs. We should eliminate age discrimination in the labor market and support the re-employment of people aged 60-70. 
This caused ridicule among netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 18, in Guangzhou, Guangdong, residents of Hengsha Village in Huangpu District welcomed Luo Yongchang, a villager who had been detained for eight days for helping villagers fight for resettlement compensation, outside the detention center and held a banquet to welcome her.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of May 19, the helicopter carrying Iranian President Raisi had a "hard landing" accident

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 18, in Guizhou, blogger Yang Defu met a ragged boy rummaging through a trash can on the street, so he treated him to a bowl of noodles and bought him a pair of new sneakers. The video received 750,000 likes in just a few hours after it was posted, and was deleted on the 19th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The blogger explains what to do in the face of the new regulations that the FBI will implement in July that allow entry to mobile phones and computers at any time

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the 35th anniversary of June 4th approaches, we cooperate with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humanitarian China @HChina89 to release the seventh of a series of special photos of June 4th, scenes from the 1989 pro-democracy movement (May 19)
[Rumors about military control, hunger strike stopped] [Zhao Ziyang visits students, tears shed in the square]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On the evening of May 19, CCTV News released a police report on the Fat Cat incident.
Fat Cat and Tan were in a normal relationship, and the two sides had financial dealings with each other. The family members have reached a settlement on the economic dispute.
The incident was maliciously planned and hyped by Fat Cat's sister. Individual netizens who sought attention, gained traffic, fabricated rumors, cyberbullied Tan, and spread conspiracy theories were punished.
